casebody.data:
HAMBY
v.
Profile PRODUCTS, et al. No. 507A06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 5, 2007. Joseph W. Moss, Charlotte, Burley B. Mitchell, Jr., Sarah L. Buthe, Raleigh, for Profile Products. Gregory C. York, Charlotte, for Electric Service Group, Inc. William H. Sturges, H. Bryan Ives, III, Charlotte, William G. Scoggin, Raleigh, for NCCBI and NCAI. The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 1st day of March 2007 by Plaintiffs for Extension of Time to File Brief: "Motion Allowed. Plaintiffs shall have up to and including the 9th day of March 2007 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 5th day of March 2007." Justice HUDSON recused.
